title: Euro Truck Simulator 2 (DLC Halloween - DLC Winter)
description:
Here are 2 dlc's from the steam version of the game. some users where asking for them.

The .zip contains:
* Ice Cold Paint Jobs Pack (dlc_winter.scs)
* Halloween Paint Jobs Pack (dlc_halloween.scs)

To install these files,
Copy the 2 files into the installation path of the game (There is also a files called 'dlc_east.scs').

By installing these files into the game, you will probably get a pink truck after some time.

You can use this torrent with this one: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9821053/Euro_Truck_Simulator_2_v1.9.22s_(DLC_Going_East)(2-click_run)
